1133140.name: CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2 -NEKO WORKs collaboration-
1133140.description:
The popular series on Steam [NEKOPARA], exclusively offers "Chocolat" and "Vanilla" costume parts for free!
When you download the game, you can dress your maid Chocolat and Vanilla costume parts from [NEKOPARA] series!

Apply and add the following edit parts on your game.

Costume
-NEKOPARA・Chocolat Set
-NEKOPARA・Vanilla Set

Bangs
-NEKOPARA・Chocolat Front
-NEKOPARA・Vanilla Bangs

Back hair
-NEKOPARA・Chocolat Back
-NEKOPARA・Vanilla Back

Hair extension
-NEKOPARA・Chocolat Pigtails
-NEKOPARA・Vanilla braids two braid

=NOTICE for users who play in VR mode=
After you have installed this DLC, please start the game in normal mode.(please do not select VR mode)
By starting game in normal mode once, you can adapt the DLC to the game data.
